TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Axis extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 提供管理 控件中的轴的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties that manage axes in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类封装控件中轴的所有功能, 由对象的、 和属性公开。This class encapsulates all the functionality for axes in the control, and is exposed by the , , and properties of objects. 对于所有图表 (条形图、堆积条形图、饼图和圆环图除外), 主要轴和辅助轴如下:For all charts - except bar, stacked bar, pie and doughnut - the primary and secondary axes are as follows: |轴类型Axis Type|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |主 X 轴Primary X-Axis|底部水平轴。Bottom horizontal axis.| |辅助 X 轴Secondary X-Axis|顶部水平轴。Top horizontal axis.| |主 Y 轴Primary Y-Axis|左垂直轴。Left vertical axis.| |辅助 Y 轴Secondary Y-Axis|右垂直轴。Right vertical axis.| 条形图和堆积条形图的轴顺时针旋转了90度, 因此这两种图表类型的主 X 轴是左垂直轴。Bar and stacked-bar charts have their axes rotated 90 degrees clockwise, so the primary X axis for these two chart types is the left-vertical axis. **注意**每个对象只能有一组轴-两个垂直和两个水平。**Note** There can be only one set of axes - two vertical and two horizontal - for each object. 类还包含若干方法, 这些方法可用于将轴值转换为绝对像素坐标, 这对于2d 自定义绘图或相对坐标非常有用, 这对于3d 自定义绘图很有用。The class also contains several methods that can be used to convert axis values to absolute pixel coordinates, which are useful for 2D custom drawing, or to relative coordinates, which are useful for 3D custom drawing. 绝对和相对坐标也可以转换为轴值。Absolute and relative coordinates can also be converted to axis values. 下面是类公开的最重要的轴元素:The following are the most important axis elements exposed by the class: |Axis 元素Axis Element|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| |轴标签Axis Labels|轴的标签及其相关属性。The labels of an axis, and their associated properties.| |网格线Grid Lines|轴的主要网格线和次要网格线。The major and minor grid lines of an axis.| |刻度线Tick Marks|轴的主要刻度线和次要刻度线。The major and minor tick marks of an axis.| |条带线Strip Lines|条带线。Strip lines.|

summary.span: 获取或设置某个轴与其关联轴相交叉的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location at which an axis is crossed by its associated axis.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示某个轴与其关联轴相交叉的位置。

span.span: A value that represents where an axis is crossed by its associated axis.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为主轴设置此属性将确定其他主轴与之相交的位置, 同样, 为辅助轴设置该属性将确定另一个辅助轴与之相交的位置。Setting this property for a primary axis will determine where the other primary axis crosses it, and similarly setting it for a secondary axis will determine where the other secondary axis crosses it. 例如, 如果设置主 X 轴的属性, 则会确定主 Y 轴将跨越它的位置。For example, setting the property of the primary X-axis determines where the primary Y-axis will cross it. 四种模式可用于轴的属性:Four modes can be used for the property of an axis: - "自动", 这意味着交叉点值将设置为相关轴的最小值或最大值。"Auto", which means that the crossing value will be set to the minimum or maximum value for the relevant axis. 如果轴是主轴, 则值为其最小值, 如果轴为辅助轴, 则其最大值为。If the axis is primary, the value will be its minimum value, if the axis is secondary it will its maximum value. 若要在运行时设置为 "自动", 请使用值。To set to "Auto" at run time, use a value. - "最小值", 表示轴的交叉点值将是其最小值。"Minimum", which means the crossing value of the axis will be its minimum value. 若要在运行时设置为 "最小", 请使用值。To set to "Minimum" at run-time use a value. - "最大值", 表示轴的交叉点值将是其最大值。"Maximum", which means the crossing value of the axis will be its maximum value. 若要在运行时设置为 "最大值", 请使用值。To set to "Maximum" at run-time use a value. - 一个指定`double`的值, 该值介于相关轴的最小值和最大值之间。A specified `double` value that is between the minimum and maximum values for the relevant axis. 如果交叉点值小于最小值, 或者交叉点值大于最大值, 则会引发异常。If the crossing value is less then minimum value, or the crossing value is greater than maximum value, an exception will be thrown. 如果使用了非默认的交叉值, 则轴的标签和刻度线可能会或不会跟随交叉轴, 这取决于属性的设置。When a non-default crossing value is used, the labels and tick marks of the axis may or may not follow the crossing axis, depending on the property setting. 默认情况下, 它们将与交叉轴一起移动。By default they will move with the crossing axis.

summary.span: 获取用于存储 对象的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object used to store objects.

value.span: 一个 对象。

span.span: A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可添加或删除轴的自定义标签。Use this property to add or remove custom labels for an axis. 使用对象, 开发人员可以随意设置轴标签的文本。Using objects enables the developer to arbitrarily set the text for axis labels. 只有自定义标签可以在标签的第二行中使用。Only custom labels can be used in the second row of labels. 此外, 如果在第一个标签行中使用自定义标签, 则第一行中的所有标签都必须是自定义标签。Also, if a custom label is used in the first label row, then all labels in this first row must be custom labels. 还可以从数据点设置标签, 也可以从轴刻度自动生成标签。Labels can also be set from the data points, or generated automatically from the axis scale.

span.span: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisEnabled Enabled { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisEnabled get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisEnabled value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示是否启用轴的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an axis is enabled.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未启用轴, 则不会显示轴及其属性 (刻度线、带状线、标签等)。If an axis is not enabled, the axis, along with its attributes (tick marks, strip lines, labels, and so forth), will not be displayed. 如果启用了轴, 则无论是否正在使用轴绘制, 都将显示轴及其所有属性 (刻度线、带状线、标签等)。If an axis is enabled, the axis, along with all its attributes (tick marks, strip lines, labels, and so forth), will be displayed regardless of whether or not it is being used to plot a . 如果使用的值, 则可能会显示轴, 也可能不显示轴, 这取决于它是否用于绘制。If a value of is used, an axis may or may not be displayed, depending on whether it is being used to plot a . 用于绘制数据的轴由和属性设置确定。The axes that are used to plot data are determined by the and property settings. > [!NOTE] > 如果未启用轴, 但相邻轴使用网格线, 则将显示其中一条网格线来代替未启用的轴。If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果将轴的属性设置为, 但轴并未用于绘制数据, 则会出现这种情况; 将改为绘制相邻轴的网格线。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to , but the axis is not being used to plot data; the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

summary.span: 获取或设置交错带状线的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of interlaced strip lines.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示交错带状线的颜色。

span.span: A object that represents the color of interlaced strip lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定在调用属性时显示的交错条带线的颜色。Use this property to specify the color of interlaced strip lines that are displayed when you invoke the property. 若要指定交错条带线的边框颜色, 必须使用 collection 属性而不是属性来显示条带。To specify the border color of the interlaced strip lines, you must display the strips using the collection property instead of the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval of an axis.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示轴的间隔。

span.span: A value that represents the interval of an axis.

value.span: 默认值为“Auto”，由值零 (0) 表示。

span.span: The default value is "Auto", which is represented by a value of zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果标签、刻度线或网格线的`Interval`属性值设置为, 则此属性可确定与轴关联的标签和主要刻度线和网格线的频率, 这表示未设置该属性。This property determines how often the labels and major tick marks and grid lines associated with the axis are drawn if the `Interval` property value of a label, tick mark, or grid line is set to , which signifies that it is not set. 轴的主要刻度线、网格线或标签的 属性优先于对象的属性设置。 `Interval`The `Interval` property of a major tick mark, grid line or label of the axis has priority over the property setting of the object. 值为零表示 "自动" 值。A value of zero represents an "Auto" value. 此属性不能设置为。This property cannot be set to . 如果将此属性的值分配给, 将改为使用零值。If you assign this property a value of , a value of zero will be used instead. **注意**轴的次要网格线和刻度线决不会将此属性用于其间隔。**Note** The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval. 轴的间隔类型由属性确定。The interval type of the axis is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::IntervalAutoMode IntervalAutoMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::IntervalAutoMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::IntervalAutoMode value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定是在轴上使用固定数目的间隔，还是根据轴的大小确定间隔数。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines if a fixed number of intervals is used on the axis, or if the number of intervals depends on the axis size.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为 "Auto" 时 , 属性确定应计算的间隔数。 When the property is set to "Auto", the property determines how many intervals should be calculated. 如果经常调整图表的大小或进行重绘, 则可以将属性设置为, 在这种情况下, 图表会动态计算轴间隔。If your chart is resized or redrawn often, you can set the property to , in which case the chart will dynamically calculate axis intervals. 如果图表间隔显示方式不同, 具体取决于它们的数据, 这种方法特别有用。This is especially useful in situations where the chart intervals are displayed differently, depending on their data.

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的间隔偏移量。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset of an axis.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示轴的间隔偏移量。

span.span: A value that represents the interval offset of an axis.

value.span: 默认值为“Auto”，由值零 (0) 表示。

span.span: The default value is "Auto", which is represented by a value of zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定轴的间隔偏移量。The property determines the interval offset of an axis. 如果`IntervalOffset`未设置标签、刻度线或网格线的属性值 (由的值表示), 则将此值用作轴标签的间隔偏移量以及与轴关联的主要刻度线和网格线。This value is used as the interval offset of an axis' labels and the major tick marks and grid lines associated with the axis if the `IntervalOffset` property value of the labels, tick marks, or grid lines is not set, which is represented by a value of . 轴的刻度线、标签和网格线的 属性优先于对象的属性设置。 The property of the tick marks, labels and grid lines of an axis has priority over the property setting of the object. 值为零表示 "自动" 值。A value of zero represents an "Auto" value. 此外, 不能将设置为"未设置" (即)。Also, cannot be set to not set (that is, a ). 如果分配, 则值为 "Auto"-也就是说, 将改用值0。If you assign , a value of "Auto" - that is, a value of zero - will be used instead. **注意**轴的次要网格线和刻度线决不会将此属性用于其间隔偏移量。**Note** The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval offset. 轴的间隔偏移量类型由属性确定。The interval offset type of the axis is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalOffsetType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的间隔偏移量类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset type of an axis.

value.span: 轴的间隔偏移量类型。

span.span: The interval offset type of an axis.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定轴的间隔偏移量类型, 并用于轴标签的间隔偏移量类型, 以及如果轴元素自己`IntervalOffsetType`的属性值设置为, 则使用主要刻度线或网格线。This property determines the interval offset type of an axis, and is used for the interval offset type of an axis' labels, and major tick marks or grid lines if the axis element's own `IntervalOffsetType` property value is set to . 将此属性设置为将导致使用值 (只有轴元素 (例如, 主要网格线等) 可以设置为)。Setting this property to will result in a value of being used (only the axis elements such as major grid lines, etc. can be set to ). > [!NOTE] > 轴的次要网格线和刻度线决不会将此属性用于其间隔偏移量类型。The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval offset type. 轴的间隔由属性确定。The interval of the axis is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的间隔类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval type of an axis.

value.span: ，表示轴的间隔类型。

span.span: A that represents the interval type of an axis.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果轴元素自己`IntervalType`的属性值设置为, 则此属性将确定轴的间隔类型, 并用于轴标签、主要刻度线或主要网格线的间隔类型。This property determines the interval type of an axis, and is used for the interval type of an axis' labels, major tick marks, or major grid lines if the axis element's own `IntervalType` property value is set to . 将此属性设置为将导致使用值。Setting this property to will result in a value of being used. 只有轴元素 (如网格线) 可以设置为。Only the axis elements, such as grid lines, can be set to . **注意**轴的次要网格线和刻度线决不会将此属性用于其间隔类型。**Note** The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval type. 轴的间隔由属性确定。The interval of the axis is determined by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果轴间隔类型由时间 (如小时数、分钟数等) 表示, 则为了使缩放功能正确无误, 还必须将设置为时间值。If the axis interval type is represented by a time such as hours, minutes, and so forth, then in order for zooming to function correctly, the must be set to a time value as well. 例如, 如果 ChartArea1 设置为 hours, 则 ChartArea1. CursorX 可以设置为分钟。For example, if ChartArea1.AxisX.IntervalType is set to hours, then ChartArea1.CursorX.IntervalType could be set to minutes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelStyle ^ LabelStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelStyle ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the properties of an axis.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于定义轴标签样式。

span.span: A object, which defines the axis label style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以指定轴标签的样式和格式等。Use this property to specify the style, formatting, and so forth, of axis labels. 如果属性为`true`, 则自动确定字体大小、字体角度和偏移标签的使用情况。 If the property is `true`, the font size, font angle and the use of offset labels are determined automatically. 如果设置了 LabelStyle 或属性中的任何一个, 则属性将设置为`false`。If you set any one of the LabelStyle.Font.Size, or properties, the property will be set to `false`. 请注意, 如果标签包含日期没有时间的格式, 并且使用的数据点值指定了时间, 则时间将影响数据点的位置, 即使它们由于标签格式而不显示。Note that if a format that consists of a date without a time is used for labels, and the data point values that are used specify times, the times will affect the positions of the data points, even though they are not displayed due to the label formatting.

get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的线条颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the line color of an axis.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示用于绘制轴的线条颜色。

span.span: A object that represents the line color used to draw the axis.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定轴的线条颜色。Use the property to specify the line color of an axis. **注意**如果未启用轴, 但相邻轴使用网格线, 则将显示其中一条网格线来代替未启用的轴。**Note** If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果轴的属性设置为, 则会出现这种情况。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to . 在这种情况下, 轴不用于绘制数据, 而是将绘制相邻轴的网格线。In this case, the axis is not being used to plot data, and the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的线型。

span.span: Gets or sets the line style of an axis.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: A enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定用于轴的线条样式。The property determines the line style used for an axis. 该行可以是纯色、点线等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth. **注意**如果未启用轴, 但相邻轴使用网格线, 则将显示其中一条网格线来代替未启用的轴。**Note** If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果轴的属性设置为, 则会出现这种情况。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to . 在这种情况下, 轴不用于绘制数据, 而是将绘制相邻轴的网格线。In this case, the axis is not being used to plot data, and the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的线条宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the line width of an axis, in pixels.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示轴线的宽度。

span.span: An value that represents the width of an axis line.

value.span: 默认值为一个 (1) 像素。

span.span: The default value is one (1) pixel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置轴线的宽度 (以像素为单位)。The property gets or sets the width of an axis line, in pixels. 如果 width 设置为零 (0), 则不会显示该行。If the width is set to zero (0), the line will not be displayed. **注意**如果未启用轴, 但相邻轴使用网格线, 则将显示其中一条网格线来代替未启用的轴。**Note** If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果轴的属性设置为, 则会出现这种情况。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to . 在这种情况下, 轴不用于绘制数据, 而是将绘制相邻轴的网格线。In this case, the axis is not being used to plot data, and the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当属性设置为`true`时, 此属性才有效。This property only has an effect when the property is set to `true`. 请注意, 此属性仅适用于用于绘制数据的值轴。Note that this property is only applicable to value axes, which are used to plot data. 为分类轴设置此属性将导致引发异常。Setting this property for a categorical axis will result in an exception being thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::Grid ^ MajorGrid { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::Grid ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::Grid ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于设置轴的主要网格线属性的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a object used to set the major grid line properties for an axis.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于获取或设置轴的主要网格线属性。

span.span: A object used to get or set the major grid properties of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要网格线始终与数据点一起绘制。Major grid lines are always drawn in conjunction with a data point. 也就是说, 它们将在轴上与数据点一起出现在同一点, 用于分类轴刻度线。That is, they will occur at the same point along an axis as a data point, for categorical axis tick marks. 对于值轴, 默认情况下会绘制主要网格线, 无论标签出现在何处。For value axes, major grid lines by default are drawn wherever labels occur. 您可以使用此属性更改主网格线频率、颜色等。You can use this property to change major grid line frequency, color, and so forth.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::TickMark ^ MajorTickMark { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::TickMark ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::TickMark ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于设置轴的主要刻度线属性的 对象。

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于设置轴的主要刻度线的属性。

span.span: A object used to set the properties of a major tick mark of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要刻度线始终与数据点一起绘制。Major tick marks are always drawn in conjunction with a data point. 分类轴刻度线将在轴上与数据点一起出现在同一点上。Categorical axis tick marks will occur at the same point along an axis as a data point. 对于值轴, 默认情况下会绘制主要刻度线, 无论标签出现在何处。For value axes, major tick marks are drawn by default wherever labels occur. 您可以使用此属性来更改主要刻度线属性, 如频率、颜色或大小。You can use this property to change the major tick mark properties such as frequency, color, or size.

summary.span: 自动舍入轴值。

span.span: Automatically rounds axis values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法以对轴的值进行舍入。Call the method to round the values of an axis. 请注意, 在调用此方法时, 不会更改轴使用的间隔。Note that the interval used for the axis will not be changed when this method is called. 此方法仅支持 X 和 X2 轴。This method is only supported for the X and X2 axes. 默认情况下, Y 和 Y2 轴值将舍入。The Y and Y2 axes values are rounded by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的对齐值为、和。Possible alignment values are , , and . 的值相当于顶部或右侧的对齐方式, 具体取决于轴或条带线的方向。A value of equates to an alignment to the top or the right, depending on the orientation of the axis or strip line. 同样, 值等于向下或向右对齐。In the same manner, a value of equates to an alignment to the bottom or the right. 如果希望更好地控制轴标题的位置, 则必须使用或事件执行自定义绘制。If you want more control over the positioning of an axis title, you must perform custom drawing using the or event. 您可以通过 使用对象的和 TitleAngle 属性来进一步对齐和定位对象的标题。You can further align and position the titles of objects by using their and TitleAngle properties.

span.span: A object used for the font properties of a title.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置标题字体属性, 例如字体或字号。Gets or sets title font properties such as face or size. 若要在运行时设置字体属性, 必须创建一个新的对象。To set font properties at run time, a new object must be created. 在运行时尝试更改当前对象的属性将导致编译错误。Any attempt to change the properties of the current object at run time will result in a compilation error.
